game.name: Shovelware
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Keyboard Only Option, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Dig your way to the bottom in one hundred levels of block digging mayhem. Avoid TNT, collect gems, save kittens, collect potatoes and more in this colourful fun filled game.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Dig your way to the bottom in one hundred levels of block digging mayhem. Avoid TNT, collect gems, save kittens, collect potatoes and more in this colourful fun filled game.
